description: Try our easy to follow Banana Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Father's Day,Banana,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Banana Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup dairy-free yoghurt (such as soy or lactose-free to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak chia seeds in 1/4 cup warm water for 10 minutes until thick.
Meanwhile, combine flours, baking powder, bicarb of soda and sugar in a bowl. Stir together soaked chia seeds, banana and milk, then fold into flour mixture until smooth and combined.

Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-low heat. Grease with a little dairy-free spread. Add 1/4 cup batter to pan for one pancake. Cook pancakes in batches, making sure not to crowd the pan, for 2 minutes or until bubbles appear. Turn and cook on the other side for 1-2 minutes.
Serve pancakes with dairy-free yoghurt, strawberries and maple syrup.
